description:
Data and Gantetsu defeat Evil Vice Admiral Fisca and Evil Sea King Tatsudon and reunites with Fire who is battling Evil Lord Azul. Blazing Knight Bahn is taken down and Fire faces a challenging fight when Lone Swordsman Dante joins forces with Fire!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Attacked with Despair! Evil Lord Azul!
襲い来る絶望! 邪神アズール
